desc: Astronomers Without Borders is a 501.3c nonprofit organization and all of the proceeds from your purchase goes to international astronomy and STEM education outreach programs. Our signature - exclusive OneSky telescope is provided courtesy of Celestron.

layout.text:
We have partnered with generous organizations to provide quality products and who support international astronomy outreach and STEM education programs.

 100% of all proceeds of each purchase goes to building community and education around the world.
